```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DESeq2)
```
```{r}
df <- read_csv(file = 'data/DE_data_tumor_TP10k.csv')
```

```{r}
df <- column_to_rownames(df, var = "gene") 
head(df)
```
```{r}
sort(rownames(df))
```

```{r}
col_data = read_csv(file = 'data/colData_deseq.csv')
```
```{r}
head(col_data)
```
```{r}
df = df +1
```
```{r}
head(df)
```

```{r}
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData=df, 
                              colData=col_data, 
                            design=~HTR1D_zero)
```
```{r}
dds
```

```{r}
dds <- DESeq(dds)
```
